snippet.title: DCS: NORMANDY 2 | Wings Of War
snippet.description:
Attention all pilots! It's time to fly over the beautiful landscape of Normandy circa 1944. DCS Normandy 2.0 has officially landed, and we couldn't be more excited. Take on the role of a historic fighter pilot and experience the excitement and awe of the 1940s as you explore the Normandy countryside.  #dcs #dcsworld #flightsimulator 

With enhanced graphics and ultra-realistic sound effects, DCS Normandy 2.0 brings the thrill of flight to your fingertips like never before. So what are you waiting for? Get ready to take off and experience DCS: Normandy 2.0 today! Visit our website to download or purchase on Steam. 

To celebrate the release of this fantastic new map, we are offering a special bonus incentive on all our DCS WWII warbirds with 50% off for a limited period of time. Thank you for all your dedication, passion and support.

DCS e-shop: https://www.digitalcombatsimulator.com/en/shop/terrains/normandy_2.0_terrain/
DCS on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/223750/DCS_World_Steam_Edition/

For owners of the original "DCS: Normandy 1944" map OR "The Channel" map, you may upgrade to Normandy 2 for just  $14.99 USD

If you already own BOTH maps, you may upgrade to DCS: Normandy 2.0 for just $9.99 USD.

Owners of the original DCS: Normandy 1944 map, that do not wish to upgrade:
Your existing DCS: Normandy 1944 map will automatically update and you’ll receive updated airfields and a significantly increased total map area.

For a full detailed FAQ, follow this link:
https://forum.dcs.world/topic/324181-normandy-20-faq-updated/

☑ Site: http://digitalcombatsimulator.com
☑ Twitter: https://twitter.com/eagledynamics
☑ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/eagle.dynamics
☑ Forum: https://forum.dcs.world
☑ Discord: https://discord.gg/eagledynamics

#DCSWorld
